email_chain.subject: Freight Quote: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

I hope this email finds you well.

Following our recent discussion, I am pleased to provide you with our firm offer for the shipment of Iron Ore:

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 150,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarao
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN TRADER
Freight: USD 25/MT
Laycan: 15-20 October 2023

This offer is valid for 48 hours. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
John Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the prompt response.

USD 25/MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 22/MT? Additionally, could you provide details on the vessel's DWT and LOA, as well as the demurrage rate?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Lisa Wang
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

Thank you for your feedback. I can adjust the rate to USD 23/MT. The vessel, MV OCEAN TRADER, has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290 meters. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
John,

USD 23/MT is still a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider USD 22.50/MT? We are also flexible with the laycan and could extend it to 17-22 October if that helps.

Best regards,
Lisa Wang
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lisa,

Given your flexibility with the laycan, I can agree to USD 22.50/MT with the revised laycan of 17-22 October. This is our best and final offer.

Please confirm your acceptance at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
John Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
John,

We accept your offer of USD 22.50/MT with the revised laycan of 17-22 October. Please send over the recap for our records.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Lisa Wang
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

Thank you for your confirmation. Please find attached the recap for the shipment:

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 150,000 MT
Load Port: Tubarao
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN TRADER
Freight: USD 22.50/MT
Laycan: 17-22 October 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day pro rata.

We look forward to working with you on this shipment.

Best regards,
John Smith
Maritime Brokers
